Tie a Necktie" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc021270_-_100-skills-070-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Tie%20a%20Necktie&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc021270_-_100-skills-070-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Tie%20a%20Necktie&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc021270_-_100-skills-070-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>Don't wait till just before an event, when the pressure's on. Set aside a relaxed time for this classic father son bonding ritual. Stand behind him as you guide him through the drill for a half Windsor knot: wide end on the left, hanging 12 in. below the narrow end. Then wide end over narrow <strong data-redactor-tag="strong">(A)</strong>, up through the loop, over and back down <strong data-redactor-tag="strong">(B)</strong>. Then wrap wide end around <strong data-redactor-tag="strong">(C)</strong>, encircling the loop clockwise <strong data-redactor-tag="strong">(D)</strong>. Wrap wide end behind the loop again, then bring it up <strong data-redactor-tag="strong">(E)</strong>, over and back down <strong data-redactor-tag="strong">(F)</strong>. Tighten and draw the knot up to the collar <strong data-redactor-tag="strong">(G)</strong>.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="73">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">74</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Grow Food</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc04d86a_-_100-skills-071-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc04d86a_-_100-skills-071-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="71. Grow Food" title="71. Grow Food" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc04d86a_-_100-skills-071-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Grow%20Food&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc04d86a_-_100-skills-071-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Grow%20Food&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc04d86a_-_100-skills-071-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>For millennia, farmers have known that raised-bed gardens drain better and are easier to keep free of weeds. Make the border of the bed out of brick, stone or wood. (Rot-resistant cedar or redwood is best; avoid creosoted rail ties.) Loosen the soil beneath the bed to a depth of 6 to 12 in. to allow good drainage. Line the bottom with fine wire mesh to foil burrowing pests, then fill the bed with 12 to 18 in. of soil. Lisa Yankowski of <a href="http://www.gardeners.com" target="_blank" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="http://www.gardeners.com">gardeners.com</a> recommends a mixture of topsoil, compost, peat moss and ground-up leaves.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="74">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">75</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Handle a Blowout</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc099052_-_100-skills-072-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc099052_-_100-skills-072-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="72. Handle a Blowout" title="72. Handle a Blowout" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc099052_-_100-skills-072-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Handle%20a%20Blowout&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc099052_-_100-skills-072-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Handle%20a%20Blowout&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc099052_-_100-skills-072-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>"Instead of hitting the brakes, maintain your speed," says Eric Espinosa, executive director of the Maryland-based National Institute of Vehicle Dynamics. Sudden changes of speed can compromise what structural integrity the tire may still have. Steer gently for the same reason. With things fully under control, slow gradually and pull over to the shoulder.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="75">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">76</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Skipper a Boat</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc0c8c43_-_100-skills-073-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc0c8c43_-_100-skills-073-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="73. Skipper a Boat" title="73. Skipper a Boat" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc0c8c43_-_100-skills-073-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Skipper%20a%20Boat&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc0c8c43_-_100-skills-073-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Skipper%20a%20Boat&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc0c8c43_-_100-skills-073-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>"You cannot assume that every driver on the water is experienced enough to know the right thing to do," says Sgt. William Arnold of the Steuben County, Ind., marine patrol. He advises following these rules: Sailboats have the right of way over powerboats, which must yield to the right. If two powerboats meet, each boat should yield to its right. When overtaking a boat, a driver should blast his horn and pass on the left&mdash;like a car on the highway. If two boats meet at an angle, the safest approach is to yield, even if the other boat is coming into your lane. Try to keep boating traffic flowing counterclockwise on small bodies of water. "Finally," Arnold says, "no speeding after sunset."</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="76">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">77</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Make a Drum-Tight Bed</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc136e95_-_100-skills-075-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc136e95_-_100-skills-075-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="75. Make a Drum-Tight Bed" title="75. Make a Drum-Tight Bed" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc136e95_-_100-skills-075-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Make%20a%20Drum-Tight%20Bed&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc136e95_-_100-skills-075-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Make%20a%20Drum-Tight%20Bed&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc136e95_-_100-skills-075-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>Tuck in the sheet along the foot of the bed; fold the sheet at a 45-degree angle at each curve of the mattress. Tightly tuck the excess sheet underneath the mattress to complete what's known as a hospital corner. "Some cadets get on their backs on the floor beneath the bed to pull the sheet tight," Kaplan says. Next, fold a blanket halfway down the bed and tuck in the bottom half. Crease the bottom edges into hospital corners and prepare for the white-glove inspection.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="77">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">78</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Shine Shoes</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc1739b7_-_100-skills-076-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc1739b7_-_100-skills-076-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="76. Shine Shoes" title="76. Shine Shoes" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc1739b7_-_100-skills-076-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Shine%20Shoes&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc1739b7_-_100-skills-076-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Shine%20Shoes&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc1739b7_-_100-skills-076-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>Wipe your shoes, then wrap a small, square white rag around your index and middle fingers. Rub one to two rotations' worth of polish into the cloth. Apply lightly in small circular motions. And, yep, it really does help to moisten the leather with a bit of spit. To buff, repeat the small circles with a clean cloth. "This removes the wax and leaves a shine," Kaplan says.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="78">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">79</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Carve a Turkey</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc1d8c8d_-_100-skills-078-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc1d8c8d_-_100-skills-078-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="78. Carve a Turkey" title="78. Carve a Turkey" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc1d8c8d_-_100-skills-078-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Carve%20a%20Turkey&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc1d8c8d_-_100-skills-078-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Carve%20a%20Turkey&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc1d8c8d_-_100-skills-078-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>Position the turkey on a wooden cutting board, cavity side facing you. Use a sharp 8- to 12-in. chef's knife and make a cut at each thigh; they'll open up naturally, and you can take them off. Split the leg and the thigh at the joint and put them on a platter. Next, use the tip of your knife to follow the bones on the left wing side, starting on top and working down. "Go slow and stay on the bone; don't go into the meat," Symon says. "The breast comes right off." Repeat on the right side, then lay the breasts on the cutting board and slice them. (Some carvers go for thin, elegant pieces; Symon prefers thick, hearty slabs.) Arrange the slices artfully on the platter&mdash;toss on some parsley sprigs as a garnish&mdash;and serve.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="79">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">80</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Replace a Broken Windowpane</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc216bec_-_100-skills-079-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc216bec_-_100-skills-079-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="79. Replace a Broken Windowpane" title="79. Replace a Broken Windowpane" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc216bec_-_100-skills-079-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Replace%20a%20Broken%20Windowpane&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc216bec_-_100-skills-079-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Replace%20a%20Broken%20Windowpane&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc216bec_-_100-skills-079-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>Wearing thick leather gloves, knock or pull out all the remaining glass. Soften the putty with a hair dryer, then cut it away with a putty knife. Using needle-nose pliers, pull out the glazing points holding the window. Cut the new glass 1/8 in. undersize, press it into a thin layer of putty and install new glazing points. Fill up the ledge outside the glass with new putty. Use the V blade on a double-end glazing tool to form the putty neatly into shape, making a smooth transition between the frame and the window. Let it dry two weeks and paint.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="80">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">81</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Change a Single-Pole Switch</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc24dd4a_-_100-skills-080-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc24dd4a_-_100-skills-080-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="80. Change a Single-Pole Switch" title="80. Change a Single-Pole Switch" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc24dd4a_-_100-skills-080-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Change%20a%20Single-Pole%20Switch&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc24dd4a_-_100-skills-080-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Change%20a%20Single-Pole%20Switch&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc24dd4a_-_100-skills-080-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>It's a dead-simple job, but the electrical connections have to be firm. To ensure good connections, wrap the wires under their respective terminal screws in a clockwise direction, so that tightening the screw reinforces the wrap. For the ground screw (the green one), hold the screw tab with a pair of needle-nose pliers to avoid accidentally snapping it off or bending it.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="81">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">82</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Fix a Clogged Sink</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-freeform listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap" style="padding-bottom:66.6667%">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-921346108-1-1533713761.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-921346108-1-1533713761.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="Person Cleaning Sink With Cup Plunger" title="Person Cleaning Sink With Cup Plunger" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-921346108-1-1533713761.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Fix%20a%20Clogged%20Sink&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fhmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fimages%2Fgettyimages-921346108-1-1533713761.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Fix%20a%20Clogged%20Sink&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fhmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fimages%2Fgettyimages-921346108-1-1533713761.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


								
<div class="image-credit listicle-slide-credit">
	<span class="image-photo-credit">AndreyPopov</span><span class="image-copyright">Getty Images</span></div>

			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>To fix a clogged sink, first make sure there is no blockage you and see or feel. Use a <a href="https://www.amazon.com/MINTCRAFT-8317-B-Black-Plunger-4-Inch/dp/B002JFW5M0/ref=sr_1_5?ie=UTF8&amp;qid=1533713611&amp;sr=8-5&amp;keywords=sink%20plunger&amp;linkCode=ogi" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" class="product-links" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="drain plunger" data-product-url="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B002JFW5M0" data-affiliate-url="" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="https://www.amazon.com/MINTCRAFT-8317-B-Black-Plunger-4-Inch/dp/B002JFW5M0/ref=sr_1_5?ie=UTF8&amp;qid=1533713611&amp;sr=8-5&amp;keywords=sink plunger&amp;linkCode=ogi" data-vars-ga-product-brand="Mintcraft" data-vars-ga-product-id="1848d0c8-cf0c-46cc-a6e6-ad47f58d886c" data-vars-ga-product-price="7.22" data-vars-ga-product-sem3-brand="Mintcraft" data-vars-ga-product-sem3-category="Drain Strainers" data-vars-ga-product-sem3-id="" data-affiliate-network='{"id":"585e38ac-716f-4f92-9fbc-ca8721de9979","site_id":"a4f9566a-1fd0-484c-b731-150b9bda9ffa","is_active":true,"details":null,"metadata":[],"network":{"id":"469ce69f-4798-416d-9432-eaa9954b4053","name":"Amazon","is_active":true,"business_unit_id":"ad046b46-538b-42cb-aa54-c3d158875ed6","details":"","metadata":[],"created_at":"2021-07-28T16:03:03.241365+00:00","last_updated_at":"2021-07-28T16:03:03.241381+00:00"}}' data-affiliate="true">drain plunger</a> to completely cover the opening of the drain and push and pull the plunger 3 or 4 times to clear the drain. If you have two drains in one sink, make sure to cover one of them with a wet rag to create an airtight seal inside the pipes.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="82">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">83</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Escape a Rip Current</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc2ed5ca_-_100-skills-083-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc2ed5ca_-_100-skills-083-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="83. Escape a Rip Current" title="83. Escape a Rip Current" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc2ed5ca_-_100-skills-083-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Escape%20a%20Rip%20Current&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc2ed5ca_-_100-skills-083-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Escape%20a%20Rip%20Current&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc2ed5ca_-_100-skills-083-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>First, stay calm&mdash;and don't fight the current. Swim parallel to the shoreline. When you're out of the current (you'll feel it, because a rip current can move 5 mph), head in toward shore.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="83">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">84</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Use a Sewing Machine</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc33bb44_-_100-skills-084-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc33bb44_-_100-skills-084-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="84. Use a Sewing Machine" title="84. Use a Sewing Machine" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc33bb44_-_100-skills-084-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Use%20a%20Sewing%20Machine&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc33bb44_-_100-skills-084-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Use%20a%20Sewing%20Machine&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc33bb44_-_100-skills-084-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>One of the most elegant mechanical devices in the home, the sewing machine can be used on camping gear, light tarps, kites and myriad other manly stuff. To start, thread the bobbin and the machine. (Check your owner's manual; machines have different threading procedures.) Once the needle is threaded and the bobbin thread pulled up from below, you're ready to sew. Use the hand wheel on the right to raise the needle to its apex. Then lift the presser foot (the small slotted metal plate) and slide your two pieces of fabric underneath. Drop the needle down to just above the cloth, and lower the presser foot to hold the cloth in place. The two pieces of cloth should be pinned to hold them together. "Pin horizontally, perpendicular to the seam," says wardrobe designer Marc Borders. "You break fewer needles." Now hit the gas (gently) with the foot pedal. The needle will start bobbing up and down, and the feed dogs will pull the cloth under the needle. Press harder on the foot pedal to speed up the process. Keep one hand lightly on either side of the presser foot so you can guide the cloth along the desired line. Don't push or pull the fabric, however. Let the feed dogs move it. To get the standard quarter-inch seam, keep the edge of the cloth even with the edge of the presser foot.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="84">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">85</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Treat a Snakebite</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc37ae48_-_100-skills-085-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc37ae48_-_100-skills-085-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="85. Snakebite" title="85. Snakebite" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc37ae48_-_100-skills-085-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Treat%20a%20Snakebite&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc37ae48_-_100-skills-085-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Treat%20a%20Snakebite&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc37ae48_-_100-skills-085-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p><strong data-redactor-tag="strong"><em data-redactor-tag="em">Myth:</em></strong> Cut open the wound and suck out the venom. </p><p><strong data-redactor-tag="strong"><em data-redactor-tag="em">Skill:</em></strong> Save your lips. The fastest, simplest treatment is a shot of antivenin. Unless you are certain that the snake was not venomous, call 911 or get yourself to the ER immediately after any snakebite. Minimize physical activity and lightly wrap the arm or leg just above the bite to limit swelling and slow the spread of venom. Antivenin is widely available and easy to administer. According to Dr. Mark Ryan of the Louisiana Poison Center, "the chances of dying from a snakebite in the U.S. are quite small."</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="85">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">86</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Survive Frostbite</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc3a80c7_-_100-skills-086-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc3a80c7_-_100-skills-086-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="86. Frostbite" title="86. Frostbite" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc3a80c7_-_100-skills-086-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Survive%20Frostbite&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc3a80c7_-_100-skills-086-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Survive%20Frostbite&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc3a80c7_-_100-skills-086-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p><strong data-redactor-tag="strong"><em data-redactor-tag="em">Myth:</em></strong> Rub snow on the affected area.</p><p><strong data-redactor-tag="strong"><em data-redactor-tag="em">Skill:</em></strong> Yeah, and cure a hangover with vodka. At the first sign of tingling, pain or numbness in the fingers, toes, ears or nose, get inside and get warm. Dunk the frostbitten parts in warm water at 100 to 105 F&mdash;the temperature of a hot tub&mdash;for 10 minutes. (The process can be painful; take some ibuprofen.) As the water cools, keep warming it back up to 100 to 105 F. If hot water is unavailable, lightly compress the frosted parts against your&mdash;or somebody else's&mdash;armpit or groin. Do not rub the affected area.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="86">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">87</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Treat Burns</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc3d50b1_-_100-skills-087-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc3d50b1_-_100-skills-087-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="87. Burns" title="87. Burns" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc3d50b1_-_100-skills-087-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Treat%20Burns&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc3d50b1_-_100-skills-087-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Treat%20Burns&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc3d50b1_-_100-skills-087-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p><strong data-redactor-tag="strong"><em data-redactor-tag="em">Myth:</em></strong> Put butter on it. </p><p><strong data-redactor-tag="strong"><em data-redactor-tag="em">Skill:</em></strong> Sorry, grandma. Cold running water is the immediate emollient of choice for minor first-degree burns. Once the burn has cooled, try ibuprofen and topical creams or sprays. For small second-degree burns (blisters; white, dead skin) get soap and water, antiseptic cream and a bandage. For larger or more severe burns, get to a doctor or the ER.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="87">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">88</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Handle Seizures</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc413b5c_-_100-skills-088-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc413b5c_-_100-skills-088-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="88. Seizures" title="88. Seizures" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc413b5c_-_100-skills-088-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Handle%20Seizures&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc413b5c_-_100-skills-088-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Handle%20Seizures&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc413b5c_-_100-skills-088-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p><strong data-redactor-tag="strong"><em data-redactor-tag="em">Myth:</em></strong> Shove a spoon in the victim's mouth so he won't swallow his tongue. </p><p><strong data-redactor-tag="strong"><em data-redactor-tag="em">Skill:</em></strong> It's physically impossible to swallow your tongue. In fact, there's little you can do to help a seizure victim except to roll him on his side into the "recovery position," remove hard or sharp items from the area and seek medical attention. Don't try to restrain him; it can only cause injury.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="88">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">89</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Remove Ticks</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc4535ed_-_100-skills-089-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc4535ed_-_100-skills-089-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="89. Ticks" title="89. Ticks" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc4535ed_-_100-skills-089-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Remove%20Ticks&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc4535ed_-_100-skills-089-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Remove%20Ticks&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc4535ed_-_100-skills-089-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p><strong data-redactor-tag="strong"><em data-redactor-tag="em">Myth:</em></strong> Burn it off with a cigarette. </p><p><strong data-redactor-tag="strong"><em data-redactor-tag="em">Skill:</em></strong> The goal is not to inflict pain on the little sucker (and probably yourself), but to remove the entire tick, including its embedded mouth parts. Using dull tweezers (sharp ones may cut off the body, leaving the head), pull the tick gently and steadily away from the skin. It may take a minute or two to gradually extract it, so be patient.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="89">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">90</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Change a Car Tire</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc48310e_-_100-skills-090-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc48310e_-_100-skills-090-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="90. Change a Tire" title="90. Change a Tire" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc48310e_-_100-skills-090-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Change%20a%20Car%20Tire&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc48310e_-_100-skills-090-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Change%20a%20Car%20Tire&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc48310e_-_100-skills-090-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>Here's Junior's first step to a NASCAR pit crew. The secret is to break the nuts loose with the wrench before you jack up the car. (Otherwise the wheel spins in the air.) Same deal in reverse: After mounting the spare, tighten the nuts with your fingers and a nip from the wrench, then lower the car for the final tightening. (Tighten in a star pattern, not a circular one.) Practice on a level driveway, and make it a game by putting him on the stopwatch.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="90">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">91</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Shovel the Right Way</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc4adda0_-_100-skills-091-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc4adda0_-_100-skills-091-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="91. Shovel the Right Way" title="91. Shovel the Right Way" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc4adda0_-_100-skills-091-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Shovel%20the%20Right%20Way&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc4adda0_-_100-skills-091-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Shovel%20the%20Right%20Way&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc4adda0_-_100-skills-091-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>"The most important thing is to make sure the blade is sharp," says Gwen Petersen, author of How to Shovel Manure and Other Life Lessons for the Country Woman. Size the blade to the density of what you're shoveling&mdash;big for snow, small for dirt. Keep knees bent and posture upright. To reduce spinal stress, dump the load behind you instead of throwing it forward.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="91">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">92</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Fix a Toilet-Tank Flapper</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc4dea6b_-_100-skills-092-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc4dea6b_-_100-skills-092-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="92. Fix a Toilet-Tank Flapper" title="92. Fix a Toilet-Tank Flapper" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc4dea6b_-_100-skills-092-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Fix%20a%20Toilet-Tank%20Flapper&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc4dea6b_-_100-skills-092-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Fix%20a%20Toilet-Tank%20Flapper&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc4dea6b_-_100-skills-092-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>A worn-out flapper valve is the usual culprit when a toilet sounds as though it's continually flushing itself. Water drains past the leaky valve and triggers the fill valve to admit more water. To replace the flapper, turn off the water supply to the toilet and flush it to drain the water from the tank. Unclip the flapper from the base of the overflow tube, lift it out of the tank and unhook the chain connecting it to the trip lever. Before you install the new flapper, use a plastic scouring pad to clean the flush valve, where the new flapper will sit when closed. Reattach the chain to the new flapper and clip it in.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="92">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">93</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Tackle Steep Drops on a Mountain Bike</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc537575_-_100-skills-093-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc537575_-_100-skills-093-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="93. Tackle Steep Drops on a Mountain Bike" title="93. Tackle Steep Drops on a Mountain Bike" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc537575_-_100-skills-093-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Tackle%20Steep%20Drops%20on%20a%20Mountain%20Bike&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc537575_-_100-skills-093-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Tackle%20Steep%20Drops%20on%20a%20Mountain%20Bike&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc537575_-_100-skills-093-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>Negotiating descents&mdash;without pitching over the handlebars&mdash;is a core skill for mountain bikers, but even casual riders should be ready for sudden dips. Here's the key: Keep the bike between you and the ground. Sounds simple, but it takes a little work. On steep descents, stand on the pedals, stretch out your arms and push your butt behind the seat. That gets your weight closer to the back of the bike rather than teetering over the front wheel. Instead of riding the bike down the hill, imagine you're pushing the bike in front of you.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="93">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">94</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Reverse Hypothermia</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc563eae_-_100-skills-094-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc563eae_-_100-skills-094-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="94. Reverse Hypothermia" title="94. Reverse Hypothermia" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc563eae_-_100-skills-094-1008-lgn.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Reverse%20Hypothermia&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc563eae_-_100-skills-094-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Reverse%20Hypothermia&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc563eae_-_100-skills-094-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>At the first sign of violent shivering, loss of coordination or confusion, take extreme measures to warm the victim. If indoors, remove any wet clothing and wrap him in an electric blanket or a standard blanket with hot-water bottles. If the victim can walk, get him into a bath with water heated to at least 100 F. Outdoors, strip off wet clothing, start a fire and get the victim into a sleeping bag, preferably with one or two warm people in a "human sandwich." Give hot, sweet drinks like cocoa, but no caffeine or alcohol.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="94">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">95</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Perform the Heimlich</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc5995f9_-_100-skills-095-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc5995f9_-_100-skills-095-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="95. Perform the Heimlich" title="95. Perform the Heimlich" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc5995f9_-_100-skills-095-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Perform%20the%20Heimlich&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc5995f9_-_100-skills-095-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Perform%20the%20Heimlich&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc5995f9_-_100-skills-095-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>If the choking person is unable to cough, get behind him, put your arms around his waist and clasp your hands together in a wrapped fist just above the navel. Sharply thrust up and back to generate an artificial cough. It is this coughing that dislodges whatever is blocking the airway.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-portrait listicle-slide-image " data-id="95">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">96</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Perform Hands-Only CPR</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-legacy listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap" style="padding-bottom:133.3333%">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc5c7948_-_100-skills-096-1008-de.jpg?fill=320:426&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 40.625rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc5c7948_-_100-skills-096-1008-de.jpg?fill=320:426&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="96. Perform Hands-Only CPR" title="96. Perform Hands-Only CPR" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc5c7948_-_100-skills-096-1008-de.jpg?fill=320:426&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Perform%20Hands-Only%20CPR&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc5c7948_-_100-skills-096-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Perform%20Hands-Only%20CPR&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc5c7948_-_100-skills-096-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>In this new, simplified procedure, place your dominant hand on the middle of the victim's chest; put your other hand on top of it and interlock your fingers. Straighten your arms and, using as much of your body weight as you can, begin sharply and rapidly compressing the chest about 2 in. with the heels of your hands. Continue to deliver 100 compressions per minute until the person revives or help arrives. And don't worry&mdash;your actions can only help.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="96">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">97</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Prune Bushes and Small Trees</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc60c873_-_100-skills-097-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc60c873_-_100-skills-097-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="Prune Bushes and Small Trees" title="Prune Bushes and Small Trees" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc60c873_-_100-skills-097-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Prune%20Bushes%20and%20Small%20Trees&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc60c873_-_100-skills-097-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Prune%20Bushes%20and%20Small%20Trees&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc60c873_-_100-skills-097-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>Limbs that are diseased or rub against each other are prime candidates for a prune job. Your tool depends on branch diameter: Use a bypass pruner for under 5/8 in.; bypass lopper, 5/8 in. to 7/8 in.; pruning saw, 7/8 in. to 2 in.; or bow saw, 2-in.-plus. For large branches, lift the tip and make a first cut up from the bottom. Finish by cutting down from the top, so the severed branch doesn't tear off bark as it falls. To remove the entire limb, saw just outside the branch collar, a raised ridge of bark that contains cells to heal the cut surface. Work from the bottom up to keep higher branches from getting caught in lower ones when they fall.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-square listicle-slide-image " data-id="97">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">98</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Unclog a Toilet</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-freeform listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap" style="padding-bottom:100.0000%">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/15/51/1450188223-flange-plunger.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="Brown, Product, Line, Tan, Beige, Maroon, Bronze, Still life photography, Finial, Balance, " title="Brown, Product, Line, Tan, Beige, Maroon, Bronze, Still life photography, Finial, Balance, " class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/15/51/1450188223-flange-plunger.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Unclog%20a%20Toilet&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2F15%2F51%2F1450188223-flange-plunger.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Unclog%20a%20Toilet&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2F15%2F51%2F1450188223-flange-plunger.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


								
<div class="image-credit listicle-slide-credit">
	<span class="image-photo-credit">Popular Mechanics</span></div>

			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>Clogged toilets are a fact of life, but don't just rely on a plumber to sort out the problem. Buy a <a href="https://www.amazon.com/SteadMax-Rubber-Toilet-Plunger-Commercial/dp/B072YVPG27/ref=sr_1_15?ie=UTF8&amp;qid=1533713173&amp;sr=8-15&amp;keywords=toilet%20plunger&amp;linkCode=ogi" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" class="product-links" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="toilet plunger" data-product-url="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B072YVPG27" data-affiliate-url="" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="https://www.amazon.com/SteadMax-Rubber-Toilet-Plunger-Commercial/dp/B072YVPG27/ref=sr_1_15?ie=UTF8&amp;qid=1533713173&amp;sr=8-15&amp;keywords=toilet plunger&amp;linkCode=ogi" data-vars-ga-product-brand="SteadMax" data-vars-ga-product-id="258fdc9a-05bb-4a55-af83-0e4ae474783f" data-vars-ga-product-price="12.99" data-vars-ga-product-sem3-brand="SteadMax" data-vars-ga-product-sem3-category="Toilet Plungers &amp; Holders" data-vars-ga-product-sem3-id="" data-affiliate-network='{"id":"585e38ac-716f-4f92-9fbc-ca8721de9979","site_id":"a4f9566a-1fd0-484c-b731-150b9bda9ffa","is_active":true,"details":null,"metadata":[],"network":{"id":"469ce69f-4798-416d-9432-eaa9954b4053","name":"Amazon","is_active":true,"business_unit_id":"ad046b46-538b-42cb-aa54-c3d158875ed6","details":"","metadata":[],"created_at":"2021-07-28T16:03:03.241365+00:00","last_updated_at":"2021-07-28T16:03:03.241381+00:00"}}' data-affiliate="true">toilet plunger</a>&mdash;which differs from a sink plunger. Make sure the toilet bowl is filled with water and the plunger has a nice tight seal and give it 3 or 4 good pushes and then release it. Repeat if necessary. </p>
			</div>
</div>
