<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="98">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">99</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Jumpstart a Car</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-4x3 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc642b31_-_100-skills-098-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc642b31_-_100-skills-098-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="98. Jumpstart a Car" title="98. Jumpstart a Car" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc642b31_-_100-skills-098-1008-de.jpg?crop=1xw:1.0xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Jumpstart%20a%20Car&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc642b31_-_100-skills-098-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Jumpstart%20a%20Car&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc642b31_-_100-skills-098-1008-de.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


								
<div class="image-credit listicle-slide-credit">
	<span class="image-photo-credit">PM</span></div>

			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>Use the red cable to connect the batteries' positive (+) terminals. Clip the black cable to the live battery's negative (-) terminal, but don't touch the other end to the dead battery's negative terminal. Instead, clip it to anything metal that's connected to the engine. Start the live car; let it idle for 10 minutes, then crank the dead car. Remove the cables in reverse order, making sure they don't touch each other or either car.</p>
			</div>
</div>



							


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-portrait listicle-slide-image " data-id="99">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
					<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">100</span>
		
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Fold the Flag</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-legacy listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap" style="padding-bottom:133.3333%">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc6a3559_-_100-skills-100-1008-lgn.jpg?fill=320:426&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 40.625rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc6a3559_-_100-skills-100-1008-lgn.jpg?fill=320:426&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="100. Fold the Flag" title="100. Fold the Flag" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/pop.h-cdn.co/assets/cm/15/06/54cfbcc6a3559_-_100-skills-100-1008-lgn.jpg?fill=320:426&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
							<div class="social-button-group slide-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-image">
	 <div class="social-button social-button-pinterest slide-social-button social-share-button" role="none" data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest">
	
	<a aria-label="Share on Pinterest" class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Fold%20the%20Flag&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc6a3559_-_100-skills-100-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fhome%2Fg87%2Fskills-everyone-should-know%2F&amp;description=Fold%20the%20Flag&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fpop.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2Fcm%2F15%2F06%2F54cfbcc6a3559_-_100-skills-100-1008-lgn.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest " aria-hidden="true"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>
</div>


			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
					<p>It takes two people to fold the American flag properly, without letting it touch the ground. Follow this illustrated sequence, tucking in the final fold so only the blue star field is visible.</p>
			</div>
</div>

<div class="simple-item transporter-simple-item grid-simple-item-last-mobile ">

			
			<a href="/home/a25318691/how-open-locked-door/" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Transporter" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="How to Open a Locked Door Without the Key" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="https://www.popularmechanics.com/home/a25318691/how-open-locked-door/" data-vars-ga-position="9" data-vars-ga-total-positions="11">

			<span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/modern-door-savannah-georgia-royalty-free-image-1605714123.?crop=1.00xw:0.751xh;0,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes"></span>

				data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/modern-door-savannah-georgia-royalty-free-image-1605714123.?crop=1.00xw:0.751xh;0,0&amp;resize=480:*"
				data-sizes="auto"
								data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/modern-door-savannah-georgia-royalty-free-image-1605714123.?crop=1.00xw:0.751xh;0,0&amp;resize=480:* 480w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/modern-door-savannah-georgia-royalty-free-image-1605714123.?crop=1.00xw:0.751xh;0,0&amp;resize=640:* 640w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/modern-door-savannah-georgia-royalty-free-image-1605714123.?crop=1.00xw:0.751xh;0,0&amp;resize=768:* 768w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/modern-door-savannah-georgia-royalty-free-image-1605714123.?crop=1.00xw:0.751xh;0,0&amp;resize=980:* 980w"
			/>
			
			
</div>


		
	
		
	
		








	



<div class="simple-item-title item-title">How to Open a Locked Door Without the Key</div>

		

		
		
	
			</a>
	</div>


															<hr class="horizontal-rule-mobile">

<script id="recirc-module-template" type="text/template">
	<div class="recirculation-module">
		<div class="recirculation-module-header">
			More From

			<a class="recirculation-module-feed-link" href="<%= data.feed.url %>"><%= data.feed.title %></a>
		</div>

		<div class="recirculation-module-inner">
			<% _.each( data.content, function( item, index ) { %>
				<div class="simple-item recirculation-module-item">
					<a
						href="<%= item.url %>"
						data-vars-ga-ux-element="Right Rail"
						data-vars-ga-call-to-action="<%= _.escape(item.title) %>"
						data-vars-ga-position="<%= index + 1 %>"
						data-vars-ga-total-positions="<%= data.content.length %>"
					>
						<div class="recirculation-module-image">
							<% if ( item.image ) { %>
								<div class="full-item-image item-image recirculation-image">
									

<img alt="" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-src="<%= item.image.src %>"
	<% if ( typeof item.image.srcset !== "undefined" && item.image.srcset.length ) { %>
		data-srcset="<%= item.image.srcset.join(",") %>"
	<% } %>
/>


									<%
	var displayTypeTitle = item.displaytype._attributes.title;
	var contentTypeTitle = item.contenttype._attributes.title;

	var contentTypeIcon = {
		"Quizzes": "quiz",
		"Video": "play"
	}[ contentTypeTitle ];

	var displayTypeIcon = {
		"Gallery": "gallery"
	}[ displayTypeTitle ];

	var acceptedContentTypes = contentTypeTitle === "Quizzes" || contentTypeTitle === "Video";
	var acceptedDisplayTypes = displayTypeTitle === "Gallery";

	var showIcons = acceptedContentTypes || acceptedDisplayTypes;
%>

<% if ( showIcons ) { %>
	<div class="content-type-icon">
		<i class="icon icon-<% if ( contentTypeIcon ) { %><%= contentTypeIcon %><% } else { %><%= displayTypeIcon %><% } %>"></i>
	</div>
<% } %>

								</div>
							<% } else { %>
								<div class="recirculation-content-indicator">
									<% if ( item && item.hasOwnProperty( "displayType" ) ) { %>
	<%
		var iconClass = {
			"Gallery": "gallery",
			"Listicle": "list",
			"Long Form Article": "feature"
		}[ item.displayType ] || "article";
	%>
	<span class="content-indicator  icon icon-<%= iconClass %>"></span>
<% } %>

								</div>
							<% } %>
						</div>

						<span class="item-title recirculation-module-item-title"><%= item.title %></span>
					</a>

					<% if ( item.sponsor ) { %>
							

<%
	var sponsorClass = {
		"1": "no-logo",
		"2": "presented-by",
		"3": "brand-logo",
		"4": "provided-by",
		"5": "created-for",
		"6": "custom-label"
	}[ item.sponsor.type ],
	siteName = item.sitename,
	customLabelLong = item.sponsor.custom_label_long,
	customLabelShort = item.sponsor.custom_label_short;
%>

<% if ( sponsorClass != "no-logo" ) { %>
	<div class="sponsor sponsor-inline simple-item-sponsor recirculation-sponsor <%= sponsorClass %>">
		<div class="sponsor-label">
			<% if ( sponsorClass === "brand-logo" ) { %>
					<span class="site-name"><%= siteName %></span>
			<% } else if ( sponsorClass === "created-for" ) { %>
				<span class="created-for--short" >
					Created for
				</span>

				<span class="created-for--long" >
					Created by <%= siteName %> for
				</span>
			<% } else if ( sponsorClass === "custom-label" ) { %>
				<span class="custom-label--short" >
					<%= customLabelShort %>
				</span>

				<span class="custom-label--long" >
					<%= customLabelLong %>
				</span>
			<% } else { %>
				<% if ( sponsorClass === "presented-by" ) { %>
					Presented by
				<% } %>

				<% if ( sponsorClass === "provided-by" ) { %>
					Created by
				<% } %>
			<% } %>
		</div>
		<% if ( sponsorClass === "brand-logo" ) { %>
			<span class="sponsor-logo-separator">+ </span>
		<% } %>
		<div class="sponsor-image">
			<%= item.sponsor.brand %>
		</div>
			</div>
<% } %>

					<% } %>
				</div>
			<% } ); %>
		</div>
	</div>
</script>

			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			d.head.appendChild(l);
		}
	} );

( function( d ) {
	const search = window.location.search;
	const ua = navigator.userAgent;
	if (~search.indexOf('disableTagManager') && (~ua.indexOf('Chrome-Lighthouse') || ~ua.indexOf('PTST')) ) return;
	const head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
	const s = document.createElement( "script" );
	s.async = true;

	
		function getCcpaCookie(name) {
		var value = '; ' + document.cookie;
		var parts = value.split('; ' + name + '=');
		if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(';').shift();
	}

	// Specific content IDs on Oprah Daily
	var otFormArr = /(35888882)|(35888950)|(35894079)|(35894089)|(35903971)|(35903882)/i;
	if (HRST.datalayer.contentId.match(otFormArr)) {
		var otFormCont = document.querySelector('.embed-iframe .embed-inner');
		var otFormFrame = document.querySelector('.embed-iframe .embed-inner iframe');
		if (otFormCont && otFormFrame) {
			var width = document.documentElement.clientWidth;

			otFormFrame.style.border = '0';
			if (width >= 980) otFormCont.style.height = '1800px';
			if (width < 980 && width > 640) otFormCont.style.height = '1850px';
			if (width <= 640) otFormCont.style.height = '2150px';
		}
	}

		function updateActiveGroups(idArr) {
		var c = {
			consent: { name: 'OptanonConsent' },
			privacy: { name: 'usprivacy' }
		};

		var date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(365*24*60*60*1000));
		var expires = '; expires=' + date.toGMTString();

		Object.values(c).map( (v) => {
			v.val = getCcpaCookie(v.name);
		});

		for (var i = 0; i < idArr.length; i++) {
			// Update the consent cookie values
			if (typeof c.consent.val !== 'undefined') {
				c.consent.val = c.consent.val.replace('%2C' + idArr[i] + '%3A0', '%2C' + idArr[i] + '%3A0');
				c.consent.val = c.consent.val.replace('%2C' + idArr[i] + '%3A1', '%2C' + idArr[i] + '%3A0');
			}

			// Update the active groups property
			if (typeof window.OptanonActiveGroups !== 'undefined') window.OptanonActiveGroups = window.OptanonActiveGroups.replace(',' + idArr[i] + ',', ',');
			if (typeof window.OnetrustActiveGroups !== 'undefined') window.OnetrustActiveGroups = window.OnetrustActiveGroups.replace(',' + idArr[i] + ',', ',');

			// Update the privacy cookie value
			c.privacy.val = c.privacy.val.replace( c.privacy.val.charAt(2), 'Y' );

		}

		// Set cookie values
		Object.values(c).map( (v) => {
			document.cookie = v.name + '=' + v.val + expires + ';path=/; Samesite=Lax;' //domain=' + domain + ';';
		});

	};

		if (HRST.datalayer.contentId.match(otFormArr)) {
		(function loadInitIabCcpaScript() {
			var otCcpaIabScript = document.createElement('script');
			otCcpaIabScript.id = 'ot-ccpa-iab-script';
			otCcpaIabScript.src = 'https://cdn.cookielaw.org/opt-out/otCCPAiab.js';
			otCcpaIabScript.setAttribute('type','text/javascript');
			otCcpaIabScript.setAttribute('charset','UTF-8');
			otCcpaIabScript.setAttribute('ccpa-opt-out-ids','C0004, SPD_BG');
			otCcpaIabScript.setAttribute('ccpa-opt-out-geo','all');
			otCcpaIabScript.setAttribute('ccpa-opt-out-lspa','false');
			document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].appendChild(otCcpaIabScript);

			otCcpaIabScript.addEventListener('load', function() {
				var intv = 0;
				var t = setInterval(function () {
					__uspapi('getUSPData', 1, function(uspData, success) {
						if (uspData.uspString !== null || intv === 50) {
							clearInterval(t);
						}
					});
					intv++;
				}, 200);

			}, { once: true });
		})();

				var formCompletionHandler = function(event) {
			if (event.origin.indexOf('onetrust') === -1) {
				return;
			}
			var data = JSON.parse(event.data);

			window.scrollTo(0,0);

			if (
				data.requestTypes.indexOf('Global DNS') !== -1
				|| data.requestTypes.indexOf('Do Not Sell My Information') !== -1
				|| data.requestTypes.indexOf('Delete My Personal Information') !== -1
				|| data.requestTypes.indexOf('Access My Personal Information') !== -1
			) {
				updateActiveGroups(['C0004', 'SPD_BG']);
				d.cookie = 'odDNS=true; path=/';
				window.removeEventListener('click', formCompletionHandler);
			}
		}

		window.addEventListener('message', formCompletionHandler);
	}

		window.GDPR_CONSENT_MODAL = function() {
				let oneTrustModalIsShowing = d.querySelector('#onetrust-banner-sdk') ? true : false;
		return oneTrustModalIsShowing;
	};

			s.src = "//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag/Bootstrap.js";
			
	if ( d.cookie.indexOf( "nsghtn=dev" ) > -1 ) {
		s.src = "//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag-dev/Bootstrap.js";
	}

						head.appendChild( s );
			
			
} )( document );
</script>
